## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G17300](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G17300)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATNS1, NS1, OVA8</u>
- **Gene Name:** ovule abortion 8
- **Description:**   Class II aminoacyl-tRNA and biotin synthetases superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2130804
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
